meta.job_title: People & Culture Manager of Operational Strategy

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deploy fundamental standard processes to improve retention and decrease turnover, leveraging systems and technology.
Lead training and development initiatives for People and Culture and Supervisors in Operations, including identification and facilitation of education and training sessions.
Collaborate with corporate communication and talent acquisition teams to develop a world-class employer branding program.
Implement and support people and culture strategies, initiatives, and programs that effectively support the vision, values, and corporate objectives of the organization.
Establish change management based on site-specific retention strategies and introduce optimal flexible shift schedules and other labor strategies.
Continuous improvement of talent identification, attraction, onboarding, and retention by working closely with sites and finding the best solutions for targeted improvements.

Ensure continuous improvement of talent identification, attraction, onboarding, and retention by working closely with sites, identifying possible improvements, managing the associated roadmap, and testing various avenues.
Collaborate with the corporate communication and talent acquisition teams to develop a world-class employer branding program that includes positioning, messaging, and branding.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Organizational Development (PHR/SPHR preferred)
